alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dodge; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:49PM EDT until August 08 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dodge County in central Georgia... Telfair County in central Georgia... Wilcox County in central Georgia... Central Wheeler County in central Georgia... Southeastern Crisp County in central Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jay Bird Springs to near Milan to Double Run, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McRae, Eastman, Abbeville, Alamo, Helena, Rochelle, Glenwood, Milan, Arabi, Rhine, Scotland, Chauncey, Pitts, Union, Towns, Spring Hill, Jay Bird Springs, China Hill, Double Run, and Godwinsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
